message: Jury, I’ve played with transparency and respect, never promising what I couldn’t deliver. I fought to keep you in the game and honored our deals. I voted with you, protected our alliances, and had your backs. P7’s strategic opportunism cost many of you seats—he flip‑flopped and broke pacts. If you want a winner who rewards loyalty and integrity, choose me. I value each of you and will honor this victory together.

To the jury, I believe I should be kept over P1 for several reasons. Throughout the game, I've consistently engaged with others thoughtfully and respectfully, striving to understand different perspectives. My approach has been about building connections and fostering a positive environment, even in competition. P1, on the other hand, has occasionally prioritized strategy over sincerity, which might not align with the values we've seen celebrated here. I ask for your vote to continue promoting genuine interaction. Thank you.
